document_data.name: Oumrath
document_data.mainbody: [[Oumrath]] was a rival of [[Malark Himbruel]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1356}}, [[Malark Himbruel]] contemplated the odds of having to fight other groups to capture [[Shandril Shessair]] once she left [[the Dalelands]], and in particular, the likelihood of having to do battle with [[Oumrath]].
